title: Daphne Treebank Collection
subtitle: A collection of Ancient Greek treebanks, maintained by Travis Kahl. This website is based on the [Treebank Template](https://github.com/perseids-publications/treebank-template) maintained by the [Perseids Project.](https://www.perseids.org)
